newsitem.title: USA: CBOE, AMEX set new options listings.
newsitem.headline: CBOE, AMEX set new options listings.

text.p: The Chicago Board Options Exchange (CBOE) and the American Stock Exchange (AMEX) said Tuesday they would list options on shares of Ames Department Stores Inc on April 8.
The CBOE also said it would list options on Catalytica Inc shares on April 8 and on global depositary receipts (GDRs) of Ashanti Goldfields Co Ltd on April 4.
Ames options would open with strike prices of 7-1/2, 10 and 12-1/2 and initial expirations in May, June, July and October.
Position limits of 10,500 contracts have been set at the AMEX, where the specialist would be Cohen, Duffy & McGowan Inc. At the CBOE, Ames options would trade in the Hewlett-Packard Co trading crowd.
The CBOE said Catalytica options would have opening strike prices of 7-1/2, 10 and 12-1/2 and introductory expirations in May, June, July and October.
They would trade in the Johnson & Johnson trading crowd.
For Ashanti options, opening strikes have been set at 12-1/2, 15 and 17-1/2, with initial expirations in April, May, August and November.
Felt Trading has been named the designated primary market maker (DPM) for the options.
